mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_info (infonum, jinfoField, companyname, infoname, ftaglist, qualificat, worktype, workarea, Deadline, pagecode, infolink) VALUES (job_info_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{jinfoField},#{companyname},#{infoname},#{ftaglist},#{qualificat},#{worktype},#{workarea},#{Deadline},#{pagecode}, #{infolink});
